mapper.select:
select apply.id,apply.baseid,car.platenumber,car.saleorgname,car.cartype,car.carorg,car.caruse_code,apply.assiststandard,apply.assistprice,apply.boardtime,apply.applystatus,apply.applytime from dev_apply apply left join dev_car_basedata car on apply.baseid=car.id where 1=1 and apply.id in ( select distinct applyid from dev_ope_history where opeorg =#{orgid} )
and car.platenumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{platenumber}),'%')
and unix_timestamp(apply.applytime)*1000>=convert(#{startdate},SIGNED)
and unix_timestamp(apply.applytime)*1000<=convert(#{enddate},SIGNED)
order by apply.applytime desc
